content: “The Paris agreement is wildly popular with U.S. voters, 71 percent of whom support U.S. involvement in the 200-nation agreement.” ha popular majority, that’s rich. how do midwest rednecks feel about the Paris agreement? as we’ve seen, the majority opinion doesnt matter, but comfortable middle-class whites’ sure do. i believe their opinion goes something like “PARIS?!? Get those f*ggot Euros out of my country! White power! Trump 2016.”
